title: Everglades National Park: Fire Success Stories
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Wildland Fire     Fire Success Stories                 Fire Success Stories        Everglades Fire and Aviation staff photo NPS Photo   Â    Fire success stories from Everglades National Park highlight events, incidents, and the like, associated with fire and fuels management as well as fire education, partnerships, technology, and more.  Stories highlight work related to the Department of Interior initiatives, regional and local initiatives such as the Everglades National Park Fire Management Plan (FMP). Click on the links below to view Fire Success Stories in Everglades National Park:  Everglades Fire Partners with Missoula Fire Lab Rapid Initial Attack Response/Assisting FFS Prescribed Fires-East Everglades 5 and Hole in the Donut West
